attachments.attachment: H.R. 1401 (110th): Rail and Public Transportation Security Act of 2007

medium.name: Seat drop
medium.description: Printed communiques put on passenger seats

medium.name: Secure radio
medium.description: A radio that transmits over an encrypted channel.

actor.name: The MTS Chief of Security
actor.description: The chief of security at the municipal transit authority

actor.name: Certified Train Operator
actor.description: Someone who successfully and recently completed an approved train operation certification test.

actor.name: An MTA certified train operator
actor.description: An employee of the Metropolis Transit Agency who is certified to drive a train.

actor.name: An MTA passenger
actor.description: A passenger on the Metropolis transit system.

actor.name: An MTA train conductor
actor.description: A person with the overall responsibility for the safety and well-being of the passengers of a train.

actor.name: An MTA bus driver
actor.description: All bus drivers are certified in basic rescue techniques.

role.name: Chief of Security
role.description: Manager in charge of all security functions.

role.name: Train Dispatcher
role.description: A Train Dispatcher is employed by a railroad to direct and facilitate the movement of trains over an assigned territory, which is usually part, or all, of a railroad operating division

place.name: The Municipality
place.description: The city with the Municipal Transit Authority.

organization.name: The Municipal Transit Authority
organization.mission: Provide safe and speedy transit to the citizens and visitors of Metropolis.

organization.name: Public Transit Agency
organization.description: An agency managing a public transportation system.
organization.mission: Typically, to provide safe and efficient mass transportation.

organization.name: The Municipal Transit Operations
organization.description: Division of MTA responsible for running bus and train services.
organization.mission: Provide for the public transportation needs of Metropolis with courteous, efficient and safe service.

organization.name: The Municipal Transit Security
organization.description: Security arm of a Municipal Transit Authority.
organization.mission: To serve and protect all users and employees of the Metropolis Transit Authority

event.name: Attack suspected
event.description: Suspicious activity or baggage detected in a public transit system

event.name: Bomb threat
event.description: Intelligence agency has issued warning of a possible suicide bombing attack on the rail transit system.

event.name: IED attack considered imminent
event.description: Upon analysis, an IED attack is considered likely in the short term.

event.name: Train held in station
event.description: A train is held in station indefinitely.

eoi.description: How much have you spent so far on the response?
What is the nature of the threat?
What is the nature of the threat?

format.name: Emergency codes
format.description: NIEM standard for emergency code transmission.

function.name: Threat response coordination
function.description: Coordination of threat response to mitigate risk of injury and death.

organization.name: The Municipal Transit Operations
organization.description: Division of MTA responsible for running bus and train services.
organization.mission: Provide for the public transportation needs of Metropolis with courteous, efficient and safe service.

organization.name: The Municipal Transit Security
organization.description: Security arm of a Municipal Transit Authority.
organization.mission: To serve and protect all users and employees of the Metropolis Transit Authority

organization.name: The Municipal Transit Authority
organization.mission: Provide safe and speedy transit to the citizens and visitors of Metropolis.

goal.description: If the IED attack is carried out, a large number of travelers and train personnel could die or be gravely injured.

segment.name: IED threat warning
segment.description: The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system

goal.description: Passengers could be injured or killed by the blast of the IED but many more could be injured in the ensuing panic.

part.task: Coordinate threat response with other transit authorities

eoi.description: What is the nature of the threat?

eoi.specialHandlingCodes: Do not disseminate unless threat is confirmed

flow.name: General safety and security alert bulletin
General safety and security alert bulletin

eoi.description: What are the details of the response plan?

eoi.content: Blanket confirmation of counter-measures being taken

eoi.description: What is the description of the suspect?

segment.name: Train held while IED attack imminent
segment.description: Responding to train held in station because of imminent IED attack

goal.description: Station, track and or trains are severely damaged.
Passengers could be injured if they panicked during evacuation, or if they are within the blast radius of an IED.

part.task: Assist in evacuation and crowd control
Assist in evacuation and crowd control

connector.segment-description: The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system
The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system

segment.name: Station Evacuation
segment.description: Evacuating a station because of an imminent IED attack.

goal.name: Prevent people getting hurt by an explosion in the station

connector.segment-description: A threat is received that a bomb will explode on a commuter train.
connector.part-task: Make sure everyone is well aware of the risks to public safety.

eoi.description: What is the nature of the threat?

connector.segment-description: A threat is received that a bomb will explode on a commuter train.

goal.description: If the IED attack is carried out, a large number of travelers and train personnel could die or be gravely injured.

part.description: Pull the safety break and go no faster than 30 mi/hr.

flow.name: IED attack suspected
flow.description: Insist on extreme caution when approaching suspects.

flow.name: Drive train out of station
flow.description: Make sure the train operator is familiar with the safe parking location.

eoi.description: What is the nature of the threat?

connector.segment-description: Train station or bus terminal executes its threat response plan.
The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system

Train station or bus terminal executes its threat response plan.

segment.name: Bomb threat on train
segment.description: A threat is received that a bomb will explode on a commuter train.

goal.name: Prevent people from getting blown up on a train

part.description: Make sure everyone is well aware of the risks to public safety.

segment.name: Local response plan activated
segment.description: Train station or bus terminal executes its threat response plan.

issue.description: The task needs summary instructions and should refer to the relevant section of the city's emergency plan.
issue.remediation: Add instructions or attach reference documentation
